addNetworks.title: Tinye Netwọk na Obere Akpa
addNetworks.description: Pịa netwọk ọ bụla iji tinye ya na MetaMask, Rabby, ma ọ bụ obere akpa Web3 ndị ọzọ

addNetwork.connectWallet: Biko jikọọ obere akpa gị na mbụ
addNetwork.alreadyPending: Arịrịọ na-echere ugbu a. Lelee obere akpa gị.
addNetwork.error: Ntinye netwọk adaghị. Biko tinye aka.

networkWarning.title: Netwọk Na-ezighi Ezi
networkWarning.message: Ntụgharị akara ngosi dị naanị na BSC Chain. Biko gbanwee na BSC iji tụgharịa akara ngosi ochie gị.

confirmModal.title: Kwado Ntụgharị
confirmModal.warning: Ị na-achọ ịtụgharị akara ngosi gị. Biko gụọ ihe ndị a nke ọma tupu ị ga-aga n'ihu.
confirmModal.irreversible: Omume a enweghị ike ịlaghachi azụ!
confirmModal.burnExplanation: A ga-agba akara ngosi {{legacySymbol}} gị ọkụ kpamkpam site na iziga ha na adreesị nwụrụ anwụ ma a ga-emepụta akara ngosi {{newSymbol}} nhata. Enweghị ike ịnwetaghachi ha ma ọ bụ tụgharịa ha azụ.
confirmModal.positiveNote: Uru ya: {{newSymbol}} enweghị ụtụ ọ bụla, na-enye gị ohere ibufe, azụmahịa, ma ọ bụ kwado n'enweghị ụgwọ ụtụ.

finalConfirmModal.title: Nkwenye Ikpeazụ
finalConfirmModal.message: Nke a bụ nzọụkwụ ikpeazụ. Mgbe ị kwadoro, a ga-agba akara ngosi {{legacySymbol}} gị ọkụ kpamkpam ma enweghị ike ịnwetaghachi ya.

bridge.noBridgeableTokens: Enweghị akara ngosi enwere ike ịkwado
bridge.addTokenError: Enweghị ike ịgbakwunye akara ngosi na obere akpa
bridge.historyStoredLocally: Echekwara akụkọ ihe mere eme nke azụmahịa na mpaghara na ngwaọrụ a

settings.title: Ntọala
settings.rpcEndpointsHelp: Melite URL RPC ejiri maka yinye ọ bụla na gburugburu ebe obibi ahọpụtara.
settings.noChainsConfigured: Enweghị yinye ahaziri maka gburugburu ebe obibi a.

banner.title: Ọ bụ ebe a ka ị bịara ọhụrụ?
banner.message: Mụta banyere Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe na otu esi ebufe akara ngosi TigerOG n'etiti yinye.
banner.note: Rịba ama: Ntụgharị akara ngosi bụ nke kpamkpam ma enweghị ike ịgbanwechara.

hero.title: Wepụ <1/> <2>Akụ</2> Gị
hero.subtitle: Na-ebufe akara ngosi TigerOG n'enweghị nsogbu n'etiti yinye site na iji Axelar's Interchain Token Service. Dị nchebe, ọsọ ọsọ, ma nwee onwe ya na ụtụ.

features.title: Interchain Token Service
features.description: Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe na-eji Axelar ITS iji wepụta ahụmịhe bridging na-enweghị nsogbu, echekwara, na enweghị ụtụ n'ofe {{count}}+ blockchains.

stopDecay.title: Kwụsị Mbelata
stopDecay.description: Akara ngosi ochie na-agba 10-11% nke uru gị na azụrụ na ire ọ bụla. Ịtụgharị na TigerOG na-akwụsị mfu a ozugbo, na-echekwa 100% nke uru gị.

conversion.title: 1:1 Ntụgharị
conversion.description: Ngụkọta ọkọnọ anaghị agbanwe agbanwe. A na-ejide akara ngosi na nkwekọrịta ntụgharị echekwara, a na-ejikwa 1:1 kpọmkwem. Enweghị ọnụ ụzọ, enweghị mbelata.

multichain.title: Multi-Chain
multichain.description: Buga otu ugboro, nweta ebe niile. Akụ gị na-aghọ akara ngosi interchain obodo na yinye gụnyere Ethereum, BNB Chain, Base, na ndị ọzọ.

security.title: Nchekwa Axelar
security.description: Site na netwọk Axelar nke ndị nkwado enweghị etiti. ITS na-ahụ na a na-ebufe akara ngosi gị n'enweghị nsogbu ma na-agbanwe agbanwe gafee netwọk niile ejikọrọ.

cta.title: Dị njikere ịkwado?
cta.description: Soro mgbanwe interchain. Ọ na-ewe ihe na-erughị otu nkeji iji tụgharịa akara ngosi gị ma malite bridging site na Axelar.

buyTokens.title: Nweta Akụ
buyTokens.description: Ị nweghị akara ngosi? Zụta akara ngosi ochie na PancakeSwap, wee tụgharịa ha na ụdị multichain ọhụrụ.

liveStats.title: Ọnụ Ọgụgụ Akara Ngosi
liveStats.description: Data oge a na-enweta na blockchain na-egosi ọkọnọ atụgharịrị na nkesa n'ofe netwọk niile akwadoro.
liveStats.liquidityDescription: Ọdọ mmiri azụmahịa na-arụ ọrụ n'ofe DEXs

header.title: Akwụkwọ
header.subtitle: Mụta otu esi atụgharị akara ngosi ochie na bridge gafee yinye.

whatIs.title: Gịnị Bụ Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe?
whatIs.content: Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe bụ usoro nkwekọrịta ekesara ewuru na Axelar's Interchain Token Service (ITS). Ọ na-enye gị ohere ịtụgharịa akara ngosi ochie na akụ enweghị ụtụ, dakọtara na interchain nke nwere ike ịga n'efu n'ofe blockchains akwadoro.
whatIs.taxFreeDesc: Akara ngosi ochie na-enwekarị ụtụ 10%+. Akara ngosi TigerOG nwere ụtụ 0%.
whatIs.omnichainDesc: Buga akụ ozugbo n'etiti {{count}}+ blockchains site na Axelar.

howToConvert.title: Otu Esi Atụgharị Akara Ngosi
howToConvert.step1: Jikọọ obere akpa gị na yinye isi (dịka, BNB Chain).
howToConvert.step3: Họrọ akara ngosi ochie ịchọrọ ịtụgharịa.
howToConvert.step4: Kwado nkwekọrịta Ntụgharị ka ọ mefuo akara ngosi gị.
howToConvert.step5: Pịa Tụgharịa iji tinye akara ngosi ochie gị ma nata ego nhata nke "TigerOG" tokens.
howToConvert.note: Rịba ama: Ntụgharị na-eweta ụtụ azụmahịa nke akara ngosi ochie (n'oge nkwalite) ma ọ bụrụ na akara ngosi gị na-ana ụtụ na mbufe. Agbanyeghị, ozugbo atụgharịrị na TigerOG, mbufe na bridges niile na-esote na-enwere onwe na ụtụ.

supportedNetworks.title: Netwọk Akwadoro
supportedNetworks.content: Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe na-akwado usoro okike na-eto eto nke {{count}}+ blockchains, na-enye ohere interoperability na-enweghị nsogbu na mpaghara EVM site na Axelar.

xerc20.title: Interchain Tokens
xerc20.content: Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) na-enye akara ngosi ohere ka ebuga ya n'ọtụtụ yinye nwere adreesị na-agbanwe agbanwe na njikwa ọkọnọ dị n'otu. Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe na-eji ITS iji hụ na TigerOG na-anọgide na-abụ akụ canonical ebe ọ bụla a kwadoro ya.

axelar.title: Axelar Network
axelar.content: Anyị na-eji Axelar dị ka akwa interoperability anyị. Axelar bụ netwọk enweghị etiti na-ejikọ blockchains dị iche iche, na-enye ohere nkwukọrịta cross-chain echekwara na mbufe akụ. Nlereanya nchekwa Axelar na-adabere na usoro ndị nkwado enweghị ikike, na-enye nchekwa dị elu maka akara ngosi interchain.

conversion.title: Uche Ntụgharị
conversion.content: A na-ebuga nkwekọrịta Ntụgharị na BSC. Mgbe ị na-atụgharị, a na-eziga akara ngosi ochie gị na adreesị nwụrụ anwụ (a na-agba ọkụ kpamkpam) ma ị na-enweta TigerOG na oke 1:1. Nke a bụ usoro otu ụzọ — a na-ebibi akara ngosi ochie ma enweghị ike ịnwetaghachi ha.

security.title: Nlereanya Nchekwa
security.content: Nchekwa dị n'ime ọkwa ọ bụla nke Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe:
security.point1: Nrụpụta Ntụgharị: A na-agba akara ngosi ochie ọkụ kpamkpam site na nkwekọrịta smart enwetara, anaghị agbanwe agbanwe.
security.point2: Axelar Validators: A na-enyocha ozi cross-chain site na netwọk Axelar enweghị etiti.
security.point3: Ọkọnọ Na-agbanwe Agbanwe: ITS na-ejikwa minting na burning iji debe ngụkọta ọkọnọ na-adịgide adịgide na yinye niile.
security.point4: Uche Enyochara: Ewuru na ọba akwụkwọ ọkọlọtọ Axelar na OpenZeppelin.

supplyCommon.howWeCalculated: Otu Anyị Si Gbakọọ Nke A
supplyCommon.verificationDesc: Enwere ike inyocha ọnụ ọgụgụ ọkọnọ niile n'onwe ha na yinye:

tigerogSupply.title: Nkewa Ọkọnọ TigerOG
tigerogSupply.intro: TigerOG nwere ọkọnọ na-ekesa nke a kapịrị ọnụ sitere na akara ngosi BNBTiger mbụ. Ngụkọta ọkọnọ na-agụnye akara ngosi niile gbara ọkụ ma kpọchie kpamkpam.
tigerogSupply.lpLocked: LP Akpọchiri (86.18% nke LP Gbara Ọkụ)
tigerogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Akara ngosi ezigara na 0x000...dEaD agbaala ọkụ kpamkpam ma enweghị ike ị nwetaghachi ya. Nke a gụnyere akara ngosi gbara ọkụ site na usoro ụtụ BNBTiger mbụ.
tigerogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Obere akara ngosi raarapara na nkwekọrịta BNBTiger n'onwe ya. Akara ngosi ndị a anaghị enweta ma wepụ ha na mgbasa ozi.
tigerogSupply.lpLockedDesc: Ọdọ mmiri PancakeSwap nwere akara ngosi BNBTiger ejikọtara na BNB. Mgbe akara ngosi LP gbara ọkụ (ezigara na adreesị nwụrụ anwụ), akara ngosi ndị dị n'okpuru na ọdọ mmiri ahụ na-akpọchi kpamkpam.
tigerogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: Akara ngosi LP gbara ọkụ: 86.18% nke akara ngosi LP niile
tigerogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ya mere, 86.18% nke akara ngosi na LP akpọchiri kpamkpam
tigerogSupply.note: Rịba ama: TigerOG na-edobe oke 1:1 na BNBTiger n'oge ntụgharị. Ọkọnọ na-ekesa nke TigerOG dabara na ezigbo ọkọnọ na-ekesa nke BNBTiger mgbe agụchara akara ngosi niile gbara ọkụ na ndị akpọchiri.
tigerogSupply.launchData: Data Mmalite: A gbakọrọ ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị a na mmalite. Akara ngosi BNBTiger ochie na-aga n'ihu na-agba akara ngosi ọkụ na azụmahịa ịzụta/ire ọ bụla, yabụ ọkọnọ na-ekesa n'ezie nwere ike ịdị ntakịrị karịa ka egosiri.

lionogSupply.title: Nkewa Ọkọnọ LionOG
lionogSupply.intro: LionOG nwere ọkọnọ na-ekesa nke a kapịrị ọnụ sitere na akara ngosi BNBLion mbụ. Ngụkọta ọkọnọ na-agụnye akara ngosi niile gbara ọkụ ma kpọchie kpamkpam.

lionogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Akara ngosi ezigara na 0x000...dEaD agbaala ọkụ kpamkpam ma enweghị ike ị nwetaghachi ya. Nke a gụnyere akara ngosi gbara ọkụ site na usoro ụtụ BNBLion mbụ.
lionogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Obere akara ngosi raarapara na nkwekọrịta BNBLion n'onwe ya. Akara ngosi ndị a anaghị enweta ma wepụ ha na mgbasa ozi.
lionogSupply.lpLockedDesc: Ọdọ mmiri PancakeSwap nwere akara ngosi BNBLion ejikọtara na BNB. Mgbe akara ngosi LP gbara ọkụ (ezigara na adreesị nwụrụ anwụ), akara ngosi ndị dị n'okpuru na ọdọ mmiri ahụ na-akpọchi kpamkpam.
lionogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: Akara ngosi LP gbara ọkụ: 99.98% nke akara ngosi LP niile
lionogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ya mere, 99.98% nke akara ngosi na LP akpọchiri kpamkpam
lionogSupply.note: Rịba ama: LionOG na-edobe oke 1:1 na BNBLion n'oge ntụgharị. Ọkọnọ na-ekesa nke LionOG dabara na ezigbo ọkọnọ na-ekesa nke BNBLion mgbe agụchara akara ngosi niile gbara ọkụ na ndị akpọchiri.
lionogSupply.launchData: Data Mmalite: A gbakọrọ ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị a na mmalite. Akara ngosi BNBLion ochie na-aga n'ihu na-agba akara ngosi ọkụ na azụmahịa ịzụta/ire ọ bụla, yabụ ọkọnọ na-ekesa n'ezie nwere ike ịdị ntakịrị karịa ka egosiri.

frogogSupply.title: Nkewa Ọkọnọ FrogOG
frogogSupply.intro: FrogOG nwere ọkọnọ na-ekesa nke a kapịrị ọnụ sitere na akara ngosi BNBFrog mbụ. Ngụkọta ọkọnọ na-agụnye akara ngosi niile gbara ọkụ ma kpọchie kpamkpam.
frogogSupply.lpLocked: LP Akpọchiri (99.31% nke LP Gbara Ọkụ)
frogogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Akara ngosi ezigara na 0x000...dEaD agbaala ọkụ kpamkpam ma enweghị ike ị nwetaghachi ya. Nke a gụnyere akara ngosi gbara ọkụ site na usoro ụtụ BNBFrog mbụ.
frogogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Obere akara ngosi raarapara na nkwekọrịta BNBFrog n'onwe ya. Akara ngosi ndị a anaghị enweta ma wepụ ha na mgbasa ozi.

frogogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: Akara ngosi LP gbara ọkụ: 99.31% nke akara ngosi LP niile
frogogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ya mere, 99.31% nke akara ngosi na LP akpọchiri kpamkpam

frogogSupply.launchData: Data Mmalite: A gbakọrọ ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị a na mmalite. Akara ngosi BNBFrog ochie na-aga n'ihu na-agba akara ngosi ọkụ na azụmahịa ịzụta/ire ọ bụla, yabụ ọkọnọ na-ekesa n'ezie nwere ike ịdị ntakịrị karịa ka egosiri.

contracts.title: Adreesị Nkwekọrịta

header.title: Nkwekọrịta Smart
header.subtitle: Adreesị mbunye gọọmentị maka akara ngosi na bridges na gburugburu ebe obibi Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe.

interchainTokens.title: Interchain Tokens
interchainTokens.description: Akara ngosi interchain ebugara site na Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS). Akara ngosi ndị a na-edobe adreesị na-agbanwe agbanwe n'ofe netwọk niile akwadoro.

axelarNetwork.title: Axelar Network
axelarNetwork.description: Usoro nzipu ozi dị n'okpuru na-echekwa mbufe cross-chain ma na-ahụ na ntụkwasị obi data n'etiti blockchains dị iche iche.

conversionContracts.title: Nkwekọrịta Ntụgharị
conversionContracts.description: Na-ahụ maka ịtụgharị akara ngosi ochie na akụ interchain. Nkwekọrịta ndị a na-ejikwa uche itinye na minting na yinye mbụ.

conversionContractsTable.title: Adreesị Nkwekọrịta Ntụgharị
conversionContractsTable.subtitle: Nkwekọrịta ndị a na BSC na-ejikwa ntụgharị site na akara ngosi ochie gaa na akara ngosi interchain.

liquidityPools.title: Ọdọ Mmiri
liquidityPools.description: Ọdọ mmiri maka azụmahịa akara ngosi OG na PancakeSwap na ndị ọzọ decentralized exchanges.

liquidityPoolsTable.title: Adreesị Ọdọ Mmiri
liquidityPoolsTable.subtitle: Ọdọ mmiri dịnụ maka akara ngosi OG ọ bụla.

liquidity.title: Ozi Ọdọ Mmiri
liquidity.description: Lelee ọdọ mmiri dị maka akara ngosi OG. Ọdọ mmiri ndị a na-enye ohere ịzụta na ire akara ngosi na decentralized exchanges.
liquidity.noPoolsFound: Enweghị ọdọ mmiri ahụrụ maka akara ngosi a
liquidity.lpBurnedExplanation: LP Gbara Ọkụ na-egosi pasent nke akara ngosi liquidity provider ezigara na adreesị nwụrụ anwụ, na-akpọchi akara ngosi ndị dị n'okpuru kpamkpam.

contracts.interchainAsset: Akụ Interchain site na Axelar ITS

faq.title: Nkwado Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe
faq.subtitle: Azịza maka ajụjụ ndị a na-ajụkarị gbasara TigerOG, bridging, na Axelar.

cta.title: Ka nwere ajụjụ?
cta.description: Soro obodo anyị na Telegram ma ọ bụ lelee Wiki zuru ezu maka ntuziaka teknụzụ.

questions.q1: Kedu ebumnuche nke ịtụgharị akara ngosi m?
questions.a1: Ịtụgharị akara ngosi gị na TigerOG na-ewepụ ụtụ azụmahịa (na-abụkarị 10-12%) jikọtara na akara ngosi ochie. Ọ na-enyekwa gị ohere ịkwado akara ngosi ndị a na blockchains ndị ọzọ dị ka Ethereum, Base, na ndị ọzọ site na Axelar, na-enye ohere ịnweta usoro okike ọhụrụ.
questions.q2: Ọ dị mma iji Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe?
questions.a2: Ee. Usoro a na-eji nkwekọrịta Ntụgharị echekwara na Axelar's Interchain Token Service. Mgbe ị na-atụgharị, BNBTiger gị na-agba ọkụ kpamkpam ma ị na-enweta TigerOG na 1:1. Usoro nsure ọkụ na-ahụ na a na-ejikwa ngụkọta ọkọnọ nke ọma n'ofe yinye niile.
questions.a3: Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe n'onwe ya anaghị ana ụgwọ maka ntụgharị. Naanị ị na-akwụ ụgwọ gas blockchain ọkọlọtọ. Bridging n'etiti yinye gụnyere ụgwọ gas cross-chain a na-akwụ Axelar iji kpuchie ụgwọ mbufe.
questions.q4: Gịnị ga-eme ma ọ bụrụ na m tufuo akara ngosi m?
questions.a4: Akara ngosi TigerOG na-akpa àgwà dị ka akara ngosi ERC20 ọ bụla ọzọ. Ọ bụrụ na ịnweghị ike ịnweta obere akpa gị, enweghị ike ị nwetaghachi ha. Jiri n'aka mgbe niile na ị na-edebe igodo nzuzo na nkebi ahịrịokwu nwetaghachi gị na nchekwa.
questions.q5: Enwere m ike ịtụgharị akara ngosi TigerOG m na BNBTiger?
questions.a5: Mba. Ntụgharị bụ otu ụzọ. Mgbe ị tụgharịrị BNBTiger na TigerOG, akara ngosi ochie gị na-agba ọkụ kpamkpam (ezigara na adreesị nwụrụ anwụ). Nke a bụ site na imewe — TigerOG bụ ụdị kwalite, enweghị ụtụ nke pụtara iji dochie akara ngosi ochie kpamkpam.
questions.a6: Anyị na-akwado ọtụtụ yinye EVM site na Axelar, gụnyere BNB Chain, Ethereum, Base, na ndị ọzọ. Lelee Wiki maka ndepụta zuru ezu nke netwọk akwadoro.
questions.q7: Ogologo oge ole ka bridging na-ewe?
questions.a7: Ọsọ bridging na-adabere n'oge ikpeazụ nke yinye isi na Axelar relaying. Dịka, mbufe n'etiti yinye na-ewe ihe dị ka nkeji 2-5.
questions.q8: Kedu ihe bụ ọkọnọ na-ekesa nke akara ngosi OG?
questions.a8: Akara ngosi OG ọ bụla nwere ọkọnọ na-ekesa nke a kapịrị ọnụ sitere na akara ngosi BNB mbụ ya, na-agụnye akara ngosi gbara ọkụ, nkwụnye ego nkwekọrịta raarapara, na LP akpọchiri. TigerOG: ~3.66 septillion (36.62% nke mbụ). LionOG: ~3.83 septillion (38.33% nke mbụ). FrogOG: ~8.39 septillion (83.86% nke mbụ). Hụ Wiki maka nkowa zuru ezu nke akara ngosi ọ bụla.
questions.q9: Kedu ihe bụ Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS)?
questions.a9: Axelar ITS bụ usoro na-enye ohere ka akara ngosi gaa n'efu n'etiti blockchains dị iche iche ma jikwa adreesị na ọkọnọ na-agbanwe agbanwe. Ọ na-ejikwa minting na burning iji hụ na akara ngosi gị na-adị ma na-echekwa n'etiti netwọk niile.
questions.q10: Kedu otu ntụgharị si arụ ọrụ na ụkpụrụ teknụzụ?
questions.a10: Mgbe ị na-atụgharị, akara ngosi ochie gị na-eziga na adreesị nwụrụ anwụ (0x...dEaD), na-agba ya ọkụ kpamkpam. Nkwekọrịta ntụgharị na-emepụta ọnụ ọgụgụ TigerOG kwekọrọ na 1:1 na obere akpa gị. Usoro a bụ nke kpamkpam ma enweghị ike ịlaghachi azụ.
questions.q11: Gịnị mere e ji agba akara ngosi ochie ọkụ kama idobe ha?
questions.a11: Ịgba ọkụ na-ewepụ akara ngosi ochie na nkesa kpamkpam, na-ahụ na enweghị onye nwere ike iji ha azụmahịa ma ọ bụ ịkpụrịta ọkọnọ. Nke a na-enye nchekwa karịa idobe ha, ebe enweghị ike ịnwetaghachi akara ngosi gbara ọkụ.
questions.q12: Enwere m ike ịtụgharị nkwụnye ego m nke ọma?
questions.a12: Ee, ị nwere ike ịtụgharị ego ọ bụla ịchọrọ. Ọ dịghị mkpa ịtụgharị nkwụnye ego gị niile n'otu oge. Agbanyeghị, ndenye aha ọ bụla na-ewe azụmahịa dịka ọ dị na BSC.
questions.q13: Gịnị ga-eme ma ọ bụrụ na akara ngosi m nọ na yinye dị iche?
questions.a13: Ntụgharị dị naanị na BSC. Ọ bụrụ na akara ngosi gị nọ na yinye dị iche, ị ga-eburu ha na BSC tupu ịtụgharị. Mgbe atụgharịrị na TigerOG, ị nwere ike bridge na yinye ndị ọzọ.
questions.q14: Kedu ihe mere m ji enwe TigerOG na BSC tupu m bridge?
questions.a14: Nkwekọrịta ntụgharị na-arụ ọrụ na BSC, ebe akara ngosi ochie dị. TigerOG na-emepụta na mbụ na BSC, wee nwere ike ịgafe na yinye ndị ọzọ site na Axelar ITS.
questions.q15: Ogologo oge ole ka ntụgharị na-ewe?
questions.a15: Ntụgharị na-ewe ihe dị ka nkeji 1-2 iji hazi, dabere na njikọ netwọk BSC. Ị ga-ahụ TigerOG gị na obere akpa gị ozugbo kwadoro azụmahịa ahụ.
questions.a16: Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe na-akwado bridging n'etiti BNB Chain, Ethereum, Base, Arbitrum, Optimism, Polygon, Avalanche, Fantom, na ndị ọzọ. Lelee ngwa ahụ maka ndepụta ọhụrụ.
questions.q17: Kedu ihe mere bridging ji achọ ụgwọ gas cross-chain?
questions.a17: Bridging achọrọ azụmahịa na yinye abụọ isi na ebe aga. Ụgwọ gas Axelar na-akpuchi ụgwọ maka relaying ozi na imezu azụmahịa n'akụkụ abụọ.
questions.q18: Gịnị ga-eme ma ọ bụrụ na bridging m tụfuru?
questions.a18: Mbufe Axelar bụ nke ịdị n'otu — ma ọ bụ ọ rụzuru ọrụ kpamkpam ma ọ bụ ọ daghị. Ọ bụrụ na azụmahịa gị tụfuru, akara ngosi gị agaghị apụ na obere akpa isi gị. Ị nwere ike ịnwale ọzọ ma ọ bụ lelee Axelarscan maka ọnọdụ.
questions.q19: Enwere m ike ịkwado akara ngosi m na obere akpa m?
questions.a19: Ee, ị nwere ike ịkwado akara ngosi gị na obere akpa ọ bụla kwadoro yinye ebe bridging gị ga-eru. Akara ngosi ga-apụta ozugbo ịgba n'ofe ahụ zuru oke.
questions.q20: Kedu ihe nchekwa dị na Axelar?
questions.a20: Axelar na-eji usoro ndị nkwado enweghị ikike nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa na-emepụta ngọngọ ya. Netwọk ahụ emepụtala nde azụmahịa n'enweghị nsogbu nchekwa ọ bụla.
questions.q21: Enwere m ike ịtụkwasị obi na nkwekọrịta smart?
questions.a21: Nkwekọrịta Ntụgharị na-eji ụkpụrụ OpenZeppelin ọkọlọtọ ma na-akpọ naanị ọrụ ITS Axelar nyochara. Enweghị ọrụ admin, enweghị proxies, na enweghị ike ịdọ akara ngosi.
questions.q22: Gịnị ga-eme ma ọ bụrụ na Axelar kwụsịrị ịrụ ọrụ?
questions.a22: Akara ngosi gị na-adịgide na yinye ebe ha nọ ugbu a. Ịkwado na-achọ netwọk Axelar, yabụ ọ bụrụ na ọ nọ na nkwarụ, ịgaghị enwe ike ịkwado ruo mgbe ọ laghachiri. Akara ngosi gị na-anọgide na nchekwa na obere akpa gị.
questions.q23: Kedu otu m ga-esi nyochaa azụmahịa m?
questions.a23: Ị nwere ike inyocha azụmahịa ntụgharị na BSCScan na azụmahịa bridging na Axelarscan. Ngwa ahụ na-enye njikọ ga-enyere gị aka ịchọpụta azụmahịa gị n'ụzọ dị mfe.
questions.q24: Nke a ọ bụ aghụghọ ma ọ bụ rug pull?
questions.a24: Mba. Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe bụ ngwa mbufe iwu na-ejikọ na Axelar ITS — ọkọlọtọ ụlọ ọrụ maka mbufe akara ngosi cross-chain. Enweghị njikwa admin na nkwekọrịta. Akara ngosi ochie na-agba ọkụ kpamkpam, anaghị echekwa ha. Akara ngosi ọhụrụ na-emepụta na oke 1:1 kpọmkwem. Koodu niile bụ nke mmepe na enyochara. Tụziere ya: anyị na-eji Axelar dị ka Stripe ma ọ bụ PayPal — usoro ụkwụ na-egosi nke pụtara ịkwaga akụ n'enweghị nsogbu. Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe bụ naanị usoro aka maka obodo nke tụgharịrị na ụdị TigerOG enweghị ụtụ.

introduction.title: Okwu Mmalite
introduction.content: Site na iji Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe ("Ngwa ahụ"), ị na-ekwenye na ị gụọla, ghọtara, ma kwenye na nkwenye a. Ọ bụrụ na ịkwenyeghị na nkwenye a, biko ejila Ngwa ahụ.

noFinancialAdvice.title: Enweghị Ndụmọdụ Ego
noFinancialAdvice.content: Ọdịnaya dị na Ngwa a bụ naanị maka ozi na nkuzi ma abụghị ndụmọdụ ego, itinye ego, ụtụ, ma ọ bụ iwu. Ị kwesịrị ịtụle onye ndụmọdụ zuru oke tupu ime mkpebi ego ọ bụla.

risksInvolved.title: Ihe Ize Ndụ
risksInvolved.content: Azụmahịa na cryptocurrency na itinye ego decentralized finance (DeFi) na-ebute ihe ize ndụ dị elu, gụnyere mana ọ naghị ejedebe na:

risks.marketVolatility: Mgbanwe ahịa na mfu ego nwere ike ime
risks.smartContractRisks: Njehie nkwekọrịta smart ma ọ bụ adịghị ike
risks.regulatoryUncertainty: Enweghị nkwụsi ike nke iwu ma ọ bụ omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
risks.technicalFailures: Ọdịda teknụzụ ma ọ bụ ihe ize ndụ nchekwa
risks.thirdPartyRisks: Ihe ize ndụ sitere n'aka ndị ọzọ dịka Axelar Network

noWarranty.title: Enweghị Nkwa
noWarranty.content: A na-enye Ngwa ahụ "dị ka ọ dị" na "dị ka ọ dị" n'enweghị nkwa ọ bụla, ma o gosipụtara ma ọ bụ gụnyere. Anyị anaghị enye nkwa na Ngwa ahụ ga-enweghị njehie, nchekwa, ma ọ bụ dị maka mkpa gị.

limitationOfLiability.title: Nkwụsị Ọrụ
limitationOfLiability.content: N'ọnọdụ ọ bụla anyị agaghị aza maka mbibi ọ bụla sitere na iji Ngwa a, gụnyere mana ọ naghị ejedebe na mfu ego, mfu data, ma ọ bụ nsogbu azụmahịa.

thirdPartyServices.title: Ọrụ Ndị Ọzọ
thirdPartyServices.content: Ngwa ahụ na-ejikọ na ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere Axelar Network, obere akpa dị iche iche, na blockchains. Anyị enweghị njikwa na ọrụ ndị a ma anaghị aza maka ọdịda ha ma ọ bụ mfu sitere na iji ha.

responsibilities.ownResearch: Mee nyocha nke gị tupu ime azụmahịa ọ bụla
responsibilities.secureWallet: Chekwaa igodo obere akpa gị na nkebi ahịrịokwu nwetaghachi
responsibilities.verifyTransactions: Nyochaa nchịkọta azụmahịa niile tupu ikwado
responsibilities.understandRisks: Ghọta ihe ize ndụ jikọtara na azụmahịa akara ngosi na bridges
responsibilities.complyWithLaws: Soro iwu dị na mpaghara gị

irreversibleTransactions.title: Azụmahịa Enweghị Ike Ịlaghachi Azụ
irreversibleTransactions.content: Azụmahịa blockchain niile, gụnyere ntụgharị akara ngosi na bridges, bụ nke kpamkpam ma enweghị ike ịlaghachi azụ. Lelee nchịkọta niile nke ọma tupu ikwado azụmahịa ọ bụla.

jurisdiction.title: Ikike Ọchịchị
jurisdiction.content: Onye ọrụ nwere ọrụ ịhụ na iji Ngwa ahụ dabara na iwu niile dị na mpaghara ha. Ụfọdụ ebe nwere ike ime ka iji Ngwa a ma ọ bụ ụfọdụ ọrụ ya bụ ihe iwu na-akwadoghị.

changesToDisclaimer.title: Mgbanwe na Nkwenye
changesToDisclaimer.content: Anyị nwere ike ịmelite nkwenye a n'oge ọ bụla n'enweghị ịgwa gị. Ịga n'ihu iji Ngwa ahụ mgbe emechara pụtara na ị nabatara nkwenye ọhụrụ ahụ.

contactInfo.title: Ozi Kọntaktị
contactInfo.content: Ọ bụrụ na ị nwere ajụjụ gbasara nkwenye a, biko kpọtụrụ anyị site na ọwa obodo anyị.

acceptance.title: Nnabata Nkwenye
acceptance.content: Site na iji Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe, ị na-anabata nkwenye a n'ụzọ zuru ezu.

disclaimerModal.title: Ọkwa Mkpa
disclaimerModal.subtitle: Biko gụọ nke ọma tupu ịga n'ihu

requirements.notProhibited: Anaghị anọ na mpaghara iwu machibidoro iji DeFi ma ọ bụ bridging
requirements.legalAge: Ị ruru afọ iwu dị n'ikike gị
requirements.understandRisks: Aghọtara na azụmahịa blockchain enweghị ike ịlaghachi azụ
requirements.ownRisk: Nabatara na ị na-eji ngwa a n'ihe ize ndụ nke gị

declined.title: Ịnweta Enweghị
declined.message: Ịkwesịrị ịnabata usoro iji nweta Àkwà Mmiri Nwereonwe.

common.failedToSwitchNetwork: Ịgbanwe netwọk adaghị. Biko gbanwee aka na obere akpa gị.
common.unableToDetermineGas: Enweghị ike ikpebi ịkwụ ụgwọ gas Axelar
